channel.title: Commands on Documentation for Cosmic CLI
channel.description: Recent content in Commands on Documentation for Cosmic CLI

item.title: cosmic-cli
item.description: A CLI interface to manage Cosmic Cloud resources Synopsis cosmic-cli is a CLI interface to manage Cosmic Cloud resources. It aims to simplify administration of Cosmic Cloud resources by providing single commands for actions that may require multiple API calls, whilst running commands against multiple API endpoints in parallel. Options -h, --help help for cosmic-cli SEE ALSO cosmic-cli acl - ACL subcommands cosmic-cli cloudops - Cloud Ops subcommands cosmic-cli instance - Instance subcommands cosmic-cli version - Print version cosmic-cli vpc - VPC subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli acl
item.description: ACL subcommands Options -h, --help help for acl SEE ALSO cosmic-cli - A CLI interface to manage Cosmic Cloud resources cosmic-cli acl list - List ACLs cosmic-cli acl rule - ACL rule subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli acl list
item.description: List ACLs cosmic-cli acl list [flags] Options -f, --filter strings filter results (supports regex) -h, --help help for list -p, --profile string specify profile(s) to use --reverse-sort reverse sort order --show-description show ACL description in result -s, --sort-by string field to sort by (default "vpcname") --vpc-id string specify VPC id --vpc-name string specify VPC name SEE ALSO cosmic-cli acl - ACL subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli acl rule
item.description: ACL rule subcommands Options -h, --help help for rule SEE ALSO cosmic-cli acl - ACL subcommands cosmic-cli acl rule list - List rules in an ACL

item.title: cosmic-cli acl rule list
item.description: List rules in an ACL cosmic-cli acl rule list [flags] Options --acl-id string specify ACL id --acl-name string specify ACL name -f, --filter strings filter results (supports regex) -h, --help help for list --instance-id string specify instance id --instance-name string specify instance name --network-id string specify network id --network-name string specify network name -p, --profile string specify profile(s) to use --reverse-sort reverse sort order --show-acl-id show ACL id in result --show-acl-name show ACL name in result --show-id show ACL rule id in result --show-rule-number show ACL rule number in result -s, --sort-by string field to sort by (default "number") SEE ALSO cosmic-cli acl rule - ACL rule subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli cloudops
item.description: Cloud Ops subcommands Options -h, --help help for cloudops SEE ALSO cosmic-cli - A CLI interface to manage Cosmic Cloud resources cosmic-cli cloudops list - Cloud Ops list subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli cloudops list
item.description: Cloud Ops list subcommands Options -h, --help help for list SEE ALSO cosmic-cli cloudops - Cloud Ops subcommands cosmic-cli cloudops list ip - List IP details cosmic-cli cloudops list mac - List MAC address details

item.title: cosmic-cli cloudops list ip
item.description: List IP details cosmic-cli cloudops list ip IPADDRESS [flags] Options -h, --help help for ip -p, --profile string specify profile(s) to use --show-mac-address show MAC address in result SEE ALSO cosmic-cli cloudops list - Cloud Ops list subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli cloudops list mac
item.description: List MAC address details cosmic-cli cloudops list mac MACADDRESS [flags] Options -h, --help help for mac -p, --profile string specify profile(s) to use SEE ALSO cosmic-cli cloudops list - Cloud Ops list subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli instance
item.description: Instance subcommands Options -h, --help help for instance SEE ALSO cosmic-cli - A CLI interface to manage Cosmic Cloud resources cosmic-cli instance list - List instances

item.title: cosmic-cli instance list
item.description: List instances cosmic-cli instance list [flags] Options -f, --filter strings filter results (supports regex) -h, --help help for list -p, --profile string specify profile(s) to use --reverse-sort reverse sort order --show-host show hypervisor hostname in result --show-id show instance id in result --show-network show network info in result --show-service-offering show instance service offering in result --show-template show instance template name in result --show-version show instance version in result -s, --sort-by string field to sort by (default "name") SEE ALSO cosmic-cli instance - Instance subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli version
item.description: Print version cosmic-cli version [flags] Options -h, --help help for version SEE ALSO cosmic-cli - A CLI interface to manage Cosmic Cloud resources

item.title: cosmic-cli vpc
item.description: VPC subcommands Options -h, --help help for vpc SEE ALSO cosmic-cli - A CLI interface to manage Cosmic Cloud resources cosmic-cli vpc list - List VPCs cosmic-cli vpc pgw - VPC private gateway subcommands cosmic-cli vpc route - VPC route subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli vpc list
item.description: List VPCs cosmic-cli vpc list [flags] Options -f, --filter strings filter results (supports regex) -h, --help help for list -p, --profile string specify profile(s) to use --reverse-sort reverse sort order --show-id show VPC id in result --show-redundant-status show VPC redundant router status in result --show-restart-required show VPC restart required status in result --show-snat show VPC Source NAT IP in result -s, --sort-by string field to sort by (default "name") SEE ALSO cosmic-cli vpc - VPC subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli vpc pgw
item.description: VPC private gateway subcommands Options -h, --help help for pgw SEE ALSO cosmic-cli vpc - VPC subcommands cosmic-cli vpc pgw list - List VPC PrivateGateways

item.title: cosmic-cli vpc pgw list
item.description: List VPC PrivateGateways cosmic-cli vpc pgw list [flags] Options -f, --filter strings filter results (supports regex) -h, --help help for list -p, --profile string specify profile(s) to use --reverse-sort reverse sort order --show-id show VPC id in result -s, --sort-by string field to sort by (default "ipaddress") SEE ALSO cosmic-cli vpc pgw - VPC private gateway subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli vpc route
item.description: VPC route subcommands Options -h, --help help for route SEE ALSO cosmic-cli vpc - VPC subcommands cosmic-cli vpc route add - Add VPC routes cosmic-cli vpc route delete - Delete VPC routes cosmic-cli vpc route flush - Flush VPC routes cosmic-cli vpc route list - List VPC routes

item.title: cosmic-cli vpc route add
item.description: Add VPC routes cosmic-cli vpc route add CIDR[,CIDR,CIDR] via NEXTHOP [flags] Options -h, --help help for add -p, --profile string specify profile(s) to use --vpc-id string specify VPC id --vpc-name string specify VPC name SEE ALSO cosmic-cli vpc route - VPC route subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli vpc route delete
item.description: Delete VPC routes cosmic-cli vpc route delete [ cidr=CIDR | nexthop=NEXTHOP ] [flags] Options -h, --help help for delete -p, --profile string specify profile(s) to use --vpc-id string specify VPC id --vpc-name string specify VPC name SEE ALSO cosmic-cli vpc route - VPC route subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli vpc route flush
item.description: Flush VPC routes cosmic-cli vpc route flush [flags] Options -h, --help help for flush -p, --profile string specify profile(s) to use --vpc-id string specify VPC id --vpc-name string specify VPC name SEE ALSO cosmic-cli vpc route - VPC route subcommands

item.title: cosmic-cli vpc route list
item.description: List VPC routes cosmic-cli vpc route list [flags] Options -f, --filter strings filter results (supports regex) -h, --help help for list -p, --profile string specify profile(s) to use --reverse-sort reverse sort order --show-id show VPC id in result -s, --sort-by string field to sort by (default "cidr") --vpc-id string specify VPC id --vpc-name string specify VPC name SEE ALSO cosmic-cli vpc route - VPC route subcommands
